verses.verse: Doth not <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> <S%H7121>cry<s%>? and <S%H8394>understanding<s%> put <S%H5414>forth<s%> her <S%H6963>voice<s%>?
She <S%H5324>standeth<s%> in the <S%H7218>top<s%> of high <S%H4791>places<s%>, by the <S%H1870>way<s%> in the <S%H1004>places<s%> of the <S%H5410>paths<s%>.
She <S%H7442>crieth<s%> <S%H3027>at<s%> the <S%H8179>gates<s%>, at the <S%H6310>entry<s%> of the <S%H7176>city<s%>, at the <S%H3996>coming<s%> in at the <S%H6607>doors<s%>.
Unto you, O <S%H376>men<s%>, I <S%H7121>call<s%>; and my <S%H6963>voice<s%> is to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>.
O ye <S%H6612>simple<s%>, <S%H995>understand<s%> <S%H6195>wisdom<s%>: and, ye <S%H3684>fools<s%>, be ye of an <S%H995>understanding<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%>.
<S%H8085>Hear<s%>; for I will <S%H1696>speak<s%> of excellent <S%H5057>things<s%>; and the <S%H4669>opening<s%> of my <S%H8193>lips<s%> shall be right <S%H4339>things<s%>.
For my <S%H2441>mouth<s%> shall <S%H1897>speak<s%> <S%H571>truth<s%>; and <S%H7562>wickedness<s%> is an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to my <S%H8193>lips<s%>.
All the <S%H561>words<s%> of my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> are in <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>; there is nothing <S%H6617>froward<s%> or <S%H6141>perverse<s%> in them.
They are all <S%H5228>plain<s%> to him that <S%H995>understandeth<s%>, and <S%H3477>right<s%> to them that <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>.
<S%H3947>Receive<s%> my <S%H4148>instruction<s%>, and not <S%H3701>silver<s%>; and <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> rather than <S%H977>choice<s%> <S%H2742>gold<s%>.
For <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> than <S%H6443>rubies<s%>; and all the things that may be <S%H2656>desired<s%> are not to be <S%H7737>compared<s%> to it.
I <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> <S%H7931>dwell<s%> with <S%H6195>prudence<s%>, and find <S%H4672>out<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> of witty <S%H4209>inventions<s%>.

The <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is to <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%>: <S%H1344>pride<s%>, and <S%H1347>arrogancy<s%>, and the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%>, and the <S%H8419>froward<s%> <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, do I <S%H8130>hate<s%>.
<S%H6098>Counsel<s%> is mine, and sound <S%H8454>wisdom<s%>: I am <S%H998>understanding<s%>; I have <S%H1369>strength<s%>.
By me <S%H4428>kings<s%> <S%H4427>reign<s%>, and <S%H7336>princes<s%> <S%H2710>decree<s%> <S%H6664>justice<s%>.
By me <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H8323>rule<s%>, and <S%H5081>nobles<s%>, even all the <S%H8199>judges<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
I <S%H157>love<s%> them that <S%H157>love<s%> me; and those that seek me <S%H7836>early<s%> shall <S%H4672>find<s%> me.
<S%H6239>Riches<s%> and <S%H3519>honour<s%> are with me; yea, <S%H6276>durable<s%> <S%H1952>riches<s%> and <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>.
My <S%H6529>fruit<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> than <S%H2742>gold<s%>, yea, than fine <S%H6337>gold<s%>; and my <S%H8393>revenue<s%> than <S%H977>choice<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%>.
I <S%H1980>lead<s%> in the <S%H734>way<s%> of <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>, in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H5410>paths<s%> of <S%H4941>judgment<s%>:
That I may cause those that <S%H157>love<s%> me to <S%H5157>inherit<s%> <S%H3426>substance<s%>; and I will <S%H4390>fill<s%> their <S%H214>treasures<s%>.
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7069>possessed<s%> me in the <S%H7225>beginning<s%> of his <S%H1870>way<s%>, <S%H6924>before<s%> his <S%H4659>works<s%> of old.
I was set <S%H5258>up<s%> from <S%H5769>everlasting<s%>, from the <S%H7218>beginning<s%>, or <S%H6924>ever<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> was.
When there were no <S%H8415>depths<s%>, I was brought <S%H2342>forth<s%>; when there were no <S%H4599>fountains<s%> <S%H3513>abounding<s%> with <S%H4325>water<s%>.
Before the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> were <S%H2883>settled<s%>, <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1389>hills<s%> was I brought <S%H2342>forth<s%>:
While as yet he had not <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%>, nor the <S%H2351>fields<s%>, nor the highest <S%H7218>part<s%> of the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of the <S%H8398>world<s%>.
When he <S%H3559>prepared<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>, I was there: when he <S%H2710>set<s%> a <S%H2329>compass<s%> upon the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H8415>depth<s%>:
When he <S%H553>established<s%> the <S%H7834>clouds<s%> <S%H4605>above<s%>: when he <S%H5810>strengthened<s%> the <S%H5869>fountains<s%> of the <S%H8415>deep<s%>:

When he <S%H7760>gave<s%> to the <S%H3220>sea<s%> his <S%H2706>decree<s%>, that the <S%H4325>waters<s%> should not <S%H5674>pass<s%> his <S%H6310>commandment<s%>: when he <S%H2710>appointed<s%> the <S%H4144>foundations<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>:
Then I was by <S%H681>him<s%>, as one brought <S%H525>up<s%> with him: and I was <S%H3117%H3117>daily<s%> his <S%H8191>delight<s%>, <S%H7832>rejoicing<s%> <S%H6256>always<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him;
<S%H7832>Rejoicing<s%> in the habitable <S%H8398>part<s%> of his <S%H776>earth<s%>; and my <S%H8191>delights<s%> were with the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%>.
Now therefore <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto me, O ye <S%H1121>children<s%>: for <S%H835>blessed<s%> are they that <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H1870>ways<s%>.
<S%H8085>Hear<s%> <S%H4148>instruction<s%>, and be <S%H2449>wise<s%>, and <S%H6544>refuse<s%> it not.

<S%H835>Blessed<s%> is the <S%H120>man<s%> that <S%H8085>heareth<s%> me, <S%H8245>watching<s%> <S%H3117%H3117>daily<s%> at my <S%H1817>gates<s%>, <S%H8104>waiting<s%> at the <S%H4201>posts<s%> of my <S%H6607>doors<s%>.
For whoso <S%H4672>findeth<s%> me <S%H4672%H4672>findeth<s%> <S%H2416>life<s%>, and shall <S%H6329>obtain<s%> <S%H7522>favour<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
But he that <S%H2398>sinneth<s%> against me <S%H2554>wrongeth<s%> his own <S%H5315>soul<s%>: all they that <S%H8130>hate<s%> me <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H4194>death<s%>.
